channel.title: Compiling
channel.description:
ive tryed like 3 different compilers and they all do the same thing, i have jdk 11 this is what the compiler says when i try to compile
@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" Java SE Downloads :end echo Finished! pause exit
it dont work, how can i make a compiler work
